title: League Stats 2023
description: Created this static website as a practice for table elements. Page displays champion stats of LEAGUE OF LEGENDS World 23 championship.

title: 2023 Game Awards
description: This is a creative HTML, CSS practice project for practicing flex, with an added theme of expressing my love for gaming. In this page I list out my gaming achievements and my favorite games of the year.

title: PortaNote
description: Concept art page for an note taking web application. I take a lot of notes. Like a lot... And this could be a life saver, that would connect all of my notes into one place so I could take my notes anywhere, anytime.
